review: This game was fun. Surprisingly addictive. Simple to play, difficult to master the throwing technique. Length of houses/neighboorhood should be increased. A little too short although that does make me want to get back in a try again even more so. Hard for me to beat my own high score once I got 1550 points. Those chimney bonus points sure help!
